backend/main.mo: Defines core actor logic for nakshatra calculations, user profiles, logging entries, and access control with helper functions for degree validation and nakshatra lookup.
backend/migration.mo: Migrates old user profiles to a new format by adding optional birthData and returns updated profile map.
feature_evidence.json: Stores feature evidence metadata linking features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERIFICATION.md: Checklist for verifying successful production deployment of version 24, including UI, version label, and core functionality checks.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes with global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading root element, dark theme, Inter font, and main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, including the new calculator page, and wraps the app with theme and toaster providers.
frontend/src/components/alerts/AlertsTog: Provides a toggle switch for enabling or disabling nakshatra alerts using a custom bell glyph.
frontend/src/components/alerts/Nakshatra: Displays a dismissible banner when the nakshatra changes, showing tone-shift content and a shift glyph.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling authentication state and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Displays a sign-in prompt using Internet Identity when no identity is present; otherwise renders children.
Modal for selecting a city or using geolocation, with search, error handling, and updates to the selected city.
frontend/src/components/errors/Connectio: Shows a connection failure message with retry and optional detailed error display.
frontend/src/components/errors/UnableToP: Displays an error screen for failed readings, offering retry and optional error details.
frontend/src/components/glyphs/Glyph.tsx: Renders various inline SVG glyph icons based on a provided type.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with navigation, city picker trigger, alerts toggle, and login button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with header, routed content outlet, and footer showing version and link.
frontend/src/components/nakshatra/Naksha: Form and logic to compute and optionally save birth nakshatra data using date, time, and location.
Renders a clickable card linking to a nakshatra detail page, showing its name, number, deity, symbols, and planetary ruler.
Displays detailed nakshatra information including symbols, deity, ruler, themes, and core traits using cards and accordions.
frontend/src/components/nakshatra/Transi: Calculates and displays estimated times for the next pada and nakshatra transitions based on moon movement and timezone.
frontend/src/components/today/DailyGuida: Shows collapsible daily guidance modules for a given nakshatra, including themes like awareness, sleep, social, creativity, and ritual.
frontend/src/components/today/DailyInter: Renders interpretation blocks describing the day's emotional, mental, social, and productivity themes plus a narrative summary.
frontend/src/components/today/DailyLogsP: Provides forms for daily check-ins, sleep logs, and dream logs, saving entries tied to the current nakshatra and day of year.
frontend/src/components/today/ResonanceS: Displays whether the current nakshatra aligns with the user's birth chart, showing Moon or Atmakaraka resonance if applicable.
frontend/src/data/cities.ts: Exports a list of world cities with names, timezones, coordinates, and optional geolocation flag.
Defines a DailyContent interface and provides daily interpretive content for each nakshatra, including emotional tone, workflow, and ritual suggestions.
frontend/src/data/nakshatras.ts: Defines Nakshatra and Pada structures and exports detailed metadata for each nakshatra including symbols, traits, and padas.
frontend/src/hooks/actorQueryKey.ts: Provides a helper to build stable actor query keys that avoid undefined values for anonymous users.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor via React Query, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorInitStatus.ts: Reads initialization status of the actor query and exposes status helpers plus a retry method using a stable query key.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorStable.ts: Creates a stable actor instance using a consistent query key and optional admin token, refetching dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCitySelection.ts: Manages selected city with validation, local storage sync, and live local time updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useDailyForecasts.ts: Exposes a placeholder hook for fetching caller-specific daily forecasts, currently returning an empty list.
frontend/src/hooks/useDailyForecastSetti: Provides placeholder hooks for getting and setting daily forecast settings, currently returning defaults until backend support exists.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state and persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: Custom hook syncing state with localStorage and across tabs using subscribers to propagate updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useNakshatraAlerts.ts: Tracks Nakshatra changes and shows an alert banner based on stored last-seen values and current Nakshatra data.
frontend/src/hooks/useNakshatraCalculato: Defines mutations to compute Nakshatra data and save birth data through the backend actor with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useNakshatraNow.ts: Computes current lunar longitude, validates it, and queries the backend for the current Nakshatra with retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements Nakshatra determination query with backend validation, actor readiness checks, and forced refetch support.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserLogs.ts: Provides queries and mutations for fetching and saving user logs, invalidating related caches as needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Defines queries and mutations for retrieving and saving the caller's user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables, typography, and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/appVersion.ts: Exports a constant containing the application version string.
frontend/src/lib/astro/lunarLongitude.ts: Computes an approximate lunar longitude for a given date using a simplified astronomical formula.
frontend/src/lib/diagnostics/nakshatraDi: Provides logging helpers for Nakshatra query failures and utilities for validating and normalizing longitude values.
frontend/src/lib/diagnostics/sanitizeErr: Converts unknown error inputs into safe display strings, handling Error objects, strings, and serializable objects.
frontend/src/lib/insights/dreamThemeExtr: Extracts keyword themes from dream logs per nakshatra by filtering stopwords and capturing up to ten unique frequent words.
frontend/src/lib/insights/nakshatraInsig: Generates up to three insight strings based on repeated check‑in patterns for energy, mood, and restlessness per nakshatra.
frontend/src/lib/nakshatra/index.ts: Provides helpers to generate nakshatra slugs and retrieve nakshatra data by slug.
frontend/src/lib/time/timezone.ts: Formats dates and reconstructs wall‑clock times in specific timezones with fallbacks for invalid zones.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/DailyForecastsPage.ts: Displays a placeholder page for upcoming daily forecast features with authentication gating.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryInsightsPage.t: Shows user insights, history, and dream themes using fetched logs, with loading states and tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgeBasePage.tsx: Renders a searchable list of all nakshatras in the knowledge base.
frontend/src/pages/NakshatraCalculatorPa: Provides a form to compute and optionally save birth nakshatra data using user‑entered birth details and location.
frontend/src/pages/NakshatraDetailPage.t: Displays nakshatra details by slug, showing its name, number, themes, and section components with a return link.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSettingsPage.t: Provides authenticated profile management including name, email, premium status, and related settings, with data loading and saving logic.
frontend/src/pages/TodayPage.tsx: Shows today's nakshatra data with loading, error, and location-handling states, plus guidance modules and premium resonance content.
frontend/src/pages/TomorrowPage.tsx: Calculates tomorrow’s lunar longitude to determine the nakshatra and renders results with error and retry handling.
frontend/src/pages/VisualStyleSystemPage: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, fonts, containers, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, known issues, existing features, and new feature requests for profile persistence and a Nakshatra Calculator.
